Buff2_Description: {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction, {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} Energy Regeneration, and {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%|]{/c} Movement Speed
desc:
{c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skills grant a stack of {c_important}Momentum{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds if they either:
{icon:bullet,1.2} Hit a Stunned, {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c}, or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy
{icon:bullet,1.2} Hit any enemy from behind

While at {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} stacks of {c_important}Momentum{/c} you gain:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Energy Regeneration
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed
name: Momentum
